channel.title: How do you make the npc's talk when you click on them?
channel.description:
i need to know how to make the npc talk when you click the talk-to or whatever because im making tutorial island and i tring to make them say what the say on runescape. so if someone could give me a couple hints or something it would great.
thank you.
